Email ID: demo01 Subject: Thank you for your application to Sika Sender: no-reply@sika.com Body: Hello Nora,

We appreciate your interest and wish you all the best in your job search.

Regards,
Sika Recruiting Team

Email ID: demo02 Subject: Thank you for your application to Ericsson Sender: talent@ericsson.com Body: Dear Nora,

Sincerely,

Email ID: demo03 Subject: Thank you for your interest in WebFX Sender: hr@webfx.com Body: Hi Nora,
